name: Chemical Chaos (JamesWilson404, HChacks)
description:
Chemical Chaos is a synergy-based tower defence. Stop the armoured patrols from escorting the chemicals to their secret lab.

The player must defend the space station from the alien onslaught, using the towers and synergies given by the cards they are dealt, and turning their own chemical weapons against them. Combine strategic tower placement with effective synergy selection to hold out against increasingly difficult waves of aliens. A tower defence with a twist, Chemical Chaos encourages you to use the enemies weapons against themselves, and strategically craft the perfect defence.

Controls

Left Click - Pick and Drag Cards Onto The Battlefield

Team Members

James Wilson

Zac Stewart

Harry Chacksfield
